title: Manchester/Victoria-Shopping District
name: Home Sweet Home
price: A meal for two with drinks will cost around Â£15
content: Home Sweet Home is a trendy hipster restaurant in the Northern Quarter. Don't come here if you want a quiet meal - it's busy and brash, but the food is great. All the food is loosely American and very tasty. Try the cheeseburger toastie or the humongous chicken and chorizo sandwich and wash it down with the Oreo milkshake.
